comments: This game was fun. The writing was funny, the art was flawless, and the voice acting was overall pretty good. For those who don't know, this game is a point and click adventure with a comedy attitude and a Lovecraftian theme.
author: robinson427

comments: I really wanted to like ***, but it just didn't have enough content. I finished the main quest in about 0 hours. It's also pretty light on gameplay - there just isn't much to do in the world. Some of what is here definitely works, though. The scene with the zucchini gets me every time.
author: Fiend_Zero
